name: Alpha Base Index
description: The Alpha Base Index is a DAO-governed DTF, curating the Top 20 Base projects with the highest risk-adjusted growth potential, leveraging the collective intelligence of the Base Trenches to identify market opportunities. Decentralized Token Folios (DTFs) are onchain portfolios that bundle multiple crypto assets into a single token. ABX is an Index DTF deployed and curated by Altcoinist on the Reserve Protocol (reserve.org), which supports two main DTF categories: Yield DTFs and Index DTFs.
